channel.title: Daily Feed (Updated 9 AM BD)
channel.description: Daily Feed (Updated 9 AM BD) generated by script

item.title: ‘This People’s March for Climate is For My Son’s Future’
item.description: Thousands, including a young father and his toddler, took to the streets for the People’s March for Climate held in the COP30 host city, Belém, Brazil. The march represents a halfway mark in the climate negotiations.

item.title: Healing the hidden wounds of childbirth
item.description: In Somalia, where six out of ten births take place without a doctor, childbirth is often a matter of survival.

item.title: Restoring dignity to Gaza: the cleanup begins
item.description: A large-scale campaign under the slogan “We Will Rebuild Gaza” was launched on Saturday in Gaza City, with the participation of local organisations and United Nations agencies, in an effort to begin cleaning operations and removing debris left by the war.

item.title: ‘When finance flows, ambition grows”: COP30’s call for action
item.description: In Belém, Brazil, as the world turns its eyes to the Amazon where COP30 has been underway for the past week, one question looms large: can climate finance move from pledge to lifeline?
